Class UI2D

java.lang.Object
vista2D.ui.UI2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener, IView
public class UI2D extends Object implements IView, com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
Clase que representa la ventana inicial del juego
Author:
Guillermo Lazzurri
